content: As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future actions of a government or make any subjective judgments. However, there have been negotiations and agreements in the past, such as the Assam Accord of 1985, which granted Assam more autonomy in decision-making in various sectors. It remains to be seen if the current demands for greater autonomy or independence from the national government will be met through negotiations or other means. It ultimately depends on the government's policies and actions, as well as the perspectives and actions of the leaders and people of Assam.
